name: Hotel Kursaal Ausonia

reviews.text: For a budget traveler like me this hotel was simply perfect!!
reviews.title: I owed you guys a review!!

reviews.text: The staff was very kind and helpful and the facilities are small but nice and clean. They were actually still remodelling when I stayed, but my experience was still pleasant. I highly recommend it!!
reviews.title: Friendly and helpful staff
Remarkable Stay
reviews.text: It's definitely going to be my first choice when I'm back in Florence!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Grazie mile!!
reviews.title: A fantastic gem with quality people!!!!! Loved it!!!

reviews.text: A very nice hotel with a good location! The staff was very friendly and helpful. For example, they helped me by emailing and calling the airport when my luggage was delayed. I would strongly recommend this place!
reviews.title: Highly recommended
Value for Money Hotel
reviews.text: This is a nice clean 2star hotel in the middle of the city, nothing fancy. Stayed there for 6 nights. Positive aspects are very friendly staff, wireless internet and 10 minutes to most destination of interest. Minor comments are the lift is broken and the air conditionning unit is noisy. I am happy to have stayed there.
Very good location. Clean, confy beds, generally good conditions. Little problems: the water in the shower was quite cold. Not good acoustic insulation.
reviews.title: 4 friends at Kursaal Ausonia

likes.disliked: — water in the shower: not hot

reviews.title: Amazing hotel and kindest people in the world!!!
reviews.text: We also used the garage service: friendly and punctual.
In general we had a pleasant stay at this hotel, good service for the price we paid!
reviews.title: Lovely ,clean,modern hotel .

reviews.text: When you arrive at the hotel the first impression is not that good as there are work in progress to change the lift but than all my expectation were satisfied. You find the reception on the 3rd floor and the first thing that makes you feel home is the hearty welcome of the staff. They are also always ready to help with anything you might need, city information, museums reservations, suggestions on restaurants and so on...Not to talk about my beautiful room, it had balcony with a beautiful view on Firenze and absolutely clean and comfortable. Breakfast was the best I've ever had and I kind of felt it was like a really sweet moment as you can share a large table with other guest and make new friends. Hotel Kursaal Ausonia is the best choice!!!
reviews.title: What a dump!

likes.liked: — I really can't think of anything!

reviews.title: cozy room great location good price
reviews.text: This was our first trip to Florence so we wanted to be centrally located for our 2 day visit.Our room was about 2and 1/2 blocks from the train station. We wheeled our bags down the street with no problems. Early December is a low season for Florence so our room cost us around 100 dollars with tax. We were contacted by e-mail regarding any preferences or special requests and we asked to be booked for visiting the Uffizi Gallery and the Accademia gallery, this was convenient.

The room was comfortable and quiet even though the street below was busy. The bathroom was impeccable, the bed good and the morning breakfast buffet was ample.There was a computer available at a small fee. the staircase and elevator were under repair during our stay and we had to lug our bags up to their 3rd floor entrance, but that should be completed by now. you may want to ask if stairs are challenging for you.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel!!

likes.liked: — The decoration and the friendly owners - stuff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We loved our stay in Florence and would happily return to this hotel.
reviews.title: Charming, convenient, friendly

reviews.text: Nice and cosy hotel with comfortable, clean and beautiful decorated rooms. Very very friendly stuff (especially Monica), in a central location (10' walk from center), highly recommended to young romantic couples! The only thing that needs improvement is the breakfast.
reviews.title: Great Price

reviews.text: George, Artemis, Nick, Elina
reviews.title: Clean, cozy, centrally located, and extremely friendly staff
wow!
reviews.text: wounderful location,very helpful staff, good breakfast.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had a tour with Paola (we had the Florence is ART and Culture offer) that was awesome!
reviews.title: A Great Hotel for the Price!

likes.liked: — It was homey and comfortable and location!
likes.disliked: — Walls are a little thin, but all of the older buildings are like that.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: would defenetly stay there again!
reviews.title: Value for money!

likes.liked: — Best value for money in Florence, lovely bathroom.
likes.disliked: — Quite firm bed and somewhat thin walls.

reviews.text: This hotel meet all of our needs for our stay in Florence. It was comfortable, good breakfast, and a superb location. We never took a bus anywhere! The hotel staff is multilingual and very helpful and friendly. It's a great stay for the price!!!
reviews.title: OK hotel, with nice location

reviews.text: For a budget traveler, this hotel offers a fantastic value for money.
reviews.title: perfect choice

description: New refurbished rooms with all comforts - Close to railway station, cathedral & Convention Center.
